Articles.Content:
Alright. More tornadoes in midwest. Just repurposing this thread as a makeshift KSP NE command Post.

Major City statuses- Below.

Grand Island status- http://www.weather.com/weather/today/68801:4:US

Omaha Status- http://www.weather.com/weather/today/USNE0363:1:US

Lincoln status- http://www.weather.com/weather/today/USNE0283:1

Edited June 17, 2014 by kenbobo
Added Major City Status.

Nature man...

It might get hairy were I am too.

Where?

DSAfnxkgjdjDARN10CHARLIMIT

Kansas.

Geary County MIGHT get hammered by the tail of the storm, or so the Doppler Radar I found on Weatherbug says.

Update: Severe Thunderstorm Watch until 5:00 AM.

I'm getting paranoid...

Edited June 15, 2014 by Special Agent Sigvan
Didn't you open a tornado thread last week? Why a new thread?
Well, it all passed. No tornado, I AM ALIVE !

Kansas.

Update: Severe Thunderstorm Watch until 5:00 AM.

I'm getting paranoid...

Severe thunderstorm watch is nothing really, I'm about an hour and a half away from you and we get those all the time. If fact, we had to turn off the alarm on our weather radio because it would wake us up in the middle of the night all the time for a silly thunderstorm.

On another note, Kansans unite!

Severe thunderstorm watch is nothing really, I'm about an hour and a half away from you and we get those all the time. If fact, we had to turn off the alarm on our weather radio because it would wake us up in the middle of the night all the time for a silly thunderstorm.

On another note, Kansans unite!

Nothing?

I died twice.
Repurposed. Wow. Alot of weather. Today, 2 tornadoes sighted near omaha!
